sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.OnCallRotation</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>On-Call Rotation API. Customization point for On-Call Rotation logic. Example usage:  var onCallRotation = new OnCallRotation(); </description> <name>OnCallRotation</name> <script><![CDATA[var OnCallRotation = Class.create(); OnCallRotation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(OnCallRotationSNC, { type: 'OnCallRotation' }); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2007-06-06 11:49:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>00de3ea6c0a81701018849faa834ee9c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OnCallRotation</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">4bca78ec3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f86</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_00de3ea6c0a81701018849faa834ee9c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-01-03 16:49:36</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
